EditLearnerProgramsSteps.intro:
Program edit page
Here, you can edit a learner program you have created. Note that you can only do this once.
Here you can edit the program name, its duration and select its language/stack.
You can add or remove phases in this section
With this, you can select an option to include holistic evaluation in the learner program.
Here, you can set up the duration of the different phases and add decision bridges for the phases.
By clicking on any of the phases above (click on the phase number) you can select the criteria captured in the phase.
